# isToMany

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the relationship can contain many managed objects.

## Declaration

```swift
var isToMany: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSRelationshipDescription/maxCount] is equal to `1`, implying a to-one relationship, this property returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]; otherwise, it returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring Cardinality

- **minCount**: The minimum number of managed objects the relationship can reference.
- **maxCount**: The maximum number of managed objects the relationship can reference.
